entry.title: Get Weather Info in Terminal
entry.content:
I sarted to play ansiweather in terminal. After installing script, I got error message, ./ansi weather: line 167: [: !=: unary operator expected . Googled it and found the solution on stackoverflow as usual.

Original code:


if [ $status_code != 200 ]
then
    echo "ERROR : Cannot fetch weather data for the given location"
    exit
fi

Modified code:


if [ "$status_code" != "200" ]
then
    echo "ERROR : Cannot fetch weather data for the given location"
    exit
fi
